name: Doodle Streets: London 1950's
description:
Complete humorous tasks by finding hidden stuff and completing small puzzles in this playful adaptation on 1950s & 1960s London.

 

Main features

  • Around 234 hidden objects or tasks to finish and even more stuff to engage with or discover across 15 vastly different levels. Or just simply relax and enjoy the sometimes busy, sometimes calm atmosphere of locations like Notting Hill, old industrial district, classical suburbs or Westminster.
  • Hand-drawn graphics carefully crafted to create 2.5D locations by using Parallax effect with up to 27 layers of depth.


  • To bring a life to the city and uphold the doodle style, most animations are dawn by hand, frame by frame.
  • Perspective matters! Sometimes things are only seen from certain angles or distance, but don’t worry, you will have enough clues to find them.


So pop out the umbrellas, search the bushes and annoy residents in this relaxing yet challenging journey to the London’s past. See ya!
